And <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came to him <S%G4334><s%>, and asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Is it <S%G1487><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for a man <S%G435><s%> to put away <S%G630><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%>? tempting <S%G3985><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Moses <S%G3475><s%> suffered <S%G2010><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> a bill <S%G975><s%> of divorcement <S%G647><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to put her away <S%G630><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, For <S%G4314><s%> the hardness <S%G4641><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G4641><s%> he wrote <S%G1125><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> precept <S%G1785><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> male <S%G730><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> female <S%G2338><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> young children <S%G3813><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should touch <S%G680><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> those that brought <S%G4374><s%> them.

But <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he was much displeased <S%G23><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> the little children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
